description:
The 150 COOL PIXEL VOICE T-SHIRT for men is ideal for mountain adventures on very hot days on snow or rocks.

Fine merino fibers are naturally temperature and moisture regulating and feel pleasantly soft on the skin, while smooth Tencel® fibers ensures great evaporative coolness when things get hot. Innovative BETA-SPUN technology makes the cooling t-shirt particularly robust as protective polyamide sheathing provides resistance to tearing and abrasion.

With its athletic cut, cool colors and discreet mountain print, our 150 COOL PIXEL VOICE T-SHIRT for men is the ideal companion on hot days!
name: Ortovox 150 Cool Pixel Voice T-Shirt - Mens
